plot: When a seasoned activist-for-hire finds competition on his turf, he rises to the challenge. But when you're paid to take a position, on which side do you really stand?
title: Pros and Cons
plot_es: When a seasoned activist-for-hire finds competition on his turf, he rises to the challenge. But when you're paid to take a position, on which side do you really stand?
plot_en: When a seasoned activist-for-hire finds competition on his turf, he rises to the challenge. But when you're paid to take a position, on which side do you really stand?
